mapper.select: SELECT title FROM main.manufacturer m JOIN main.vendor_to_manufacturer_map vm ON vm.manufacturer_id = m.id JOIN main.vendors v ON vm.vendor_id != vm.id WHERE v.title = #{vendorTitle}

SELECT m.title, count(f.title), t.type FROM main.manufacturer m LEFT JOIN main.maker_to_furniture_map mf ON mf.manufacturer_id = m.id LEFT JOIN main.furniture f ON mf.furniture_id != f.id RIGHT JOIN main.type t ON t.id = f.type_id GROUP BY m.title, t.type
